definitions.text: someone who mediates between speakers of different languages
someone who uses art to represent something
examples: his paintings reveal a sensitive interpreter of nature
she was famous as an interpreter of Shakespearean roles

definitions.text: an advocate who represents someone else's policy or purpose
examples: the meeting was attended by spokespersons for all the major organs of government

definitions.text: (computer science) a program that translates and executes source language statements one line at a time
